title: Simple lasagne
ingredients: ['splash olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 onion, chopped', '1 yellow pepper, chopped', '1 green pepper, chopped', 'large handful of sliced mushrooms', '500g minced beef', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '2 tbsp tomato puree', '1 tsp ground cumin', "very large splash Henderson's relish", '1 vegetable stock cube', '500ml milk', '8 tbsp olive oil', '4 tbsp plain flour', '150g cheese, grated', '1 large tomato', '200g fresh or frozen spinach', '1 packet lasagne sheets', 'salt and pepper to taste']
